Title: Disco Bob
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Maisha Closson, Cole Maliska, Cole Maliska (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: Complicated clues surround the murder of a mother and her daughter. While, Lindsay prepares for an undercover investigation in Bolivia, and it dawns on Burgess and Roman that they need to put the past behind them.
